name: Feeding Bottle
specification: Plastic or glass, 120â€“250 mL, silicone nipple, clear measuring marks.
function: Feeds infants using formula or expressed milk.
usage: Sterilize parts; fill with appropriate fluid; cap and shake; feed infant, holding bottle at an angle.
maintenance: Clean and sterilize after every use; inspect nipple for damage.
warning: Never reuse bottles without sterilizing; damaged nipples may cause choking.
